home.title: Order Items
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Order Item

orderItem.created: A new Order Item is created with identifier {{ param }}
orderItem.updated: A Order Item is updated with identifier {{ param }}
orderItem.deleted: A Order Item is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Order Item {{ id }}?

help.originalPrice: 原价（单位：分）。原价要么为空，要么大于等于售价。原价为空或等于售价时，是普通菜品；原价不为空且原价大于售价时，是特惠菜品
help.coupon: 兑换券的code。该字段不为空，表示这是一个兑换商品
